info.name: Dexless - Dark/Gray theme
info.description:
A simple gray theme faithful to the normal white one. Enjoy!

If you have any questions or have found any bugs, please PM me on Dexless: James
info.additionalInfo:
version 1: Most of the style is finished, will iron out kinks when I come across them.
version 1.1: Minor changes of polls, alerts, other random variables I've come across.
